@_comment: If environment is not a container, it is machine

title: No CD/DVD drive is configured to automount in /etc/fstab
description:
Check the /etc/fstab and check if a CD/DVD drive
      is not configured for automount.

@_comment: Check if CD/DVD drive is not configured to automout in /etc/fstab

title: Test for different architecture than s390x
description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is not s390x

title: Test that the architecture is s390x
description: Check that architecture of kernel in /proc/sys/kernel/osrelease is s390x

title: Device Files for Removable Media Partitions Does Not Exist on the System
description:
Verify if device file representing removable partitions
      exist on the system

@_comment: Check if removable partition really exists on the system

title: SSHD is not required to be installed or requirement not set
description: If SSHD is not required, we check it is not installed. If SSH requirement is unset, we are good.

@_comment: SSH not required or not set

title: SSHD is required to be installed or requirement not set
description: If SSHD is required, we check it is installed. If SSH requirement is unset, we are good.

title: It doesn't matter if sshd is installed or not
description: Test if value sshd_required is 0.

title: OpenSSH Server is 7.4 or newer
description: Check if version of OpenSSH Server is equal or higher than 7.4

@_comment: Check if OpenSSH Server is equal or higher than 7.4
OpenSSH Server version is equal or higher than 7.4

title: Verify The SSSD Configuration File Exists
description:
The /etc/sssd/sssd.conf file should exist if it is
      in use.

title: SSSD is configured to use LDAP
description: Identification provider is not set to ad within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

@_comment: Identification provider is not set to ad within /etc/sssd/sssd.conf

title: Kernel Runtime Parameter IPv6 Check
description: Disables IPv6 for all network interfaces.

@_comment: IPv6 disabled or net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 set correctly

title: Non-UEFI system boot mode check
description: Check if System boot mode is non-UEFI.

@_comment: Pass if System boot mode is non-UEFI

title: UEFI system boot mode check
description: Check if system boot mode is UEFI.

description: Generic test for 64-bit architectures to be used by other tests

description: Generic test for aarch_64 architecture to be used by other tests

title: Test for PPC and PPCLE Architecture
description: Generic test for PPC PPC64LE architecture to be used by other tests

title: Test for s390_64 Architecture
description: Generic test for s390_64 architecture to be used by other tests

title: Test for x86 Architecture
description: Generic test for x86 architecture to be used by other tests

title: Test for x86_64 Architecture
description: Generic test for x86_64 architecture to be used by other tests

title: Check that file storing USBGuard rules exists and is not empty
description: Check that file storing USBGuard rules at /etc/usbguard/rules.conf exists and is not empty

@_comment: Check that the usbguard rules in either /etc/usbguard/rules.conf or /etc/usbguard/rules.d/ contain at least one non white space character.
Check that file storing USBGuard rules exists and is not empty

description: Value of 'var_accounts_user_umask' variable represented as octal number
